record.field: Communication of operations for the 347 report

Muy Sres. nuestros:

The reason for this letter is to inform you that, in accordance with current legislation and for the purpose of making the annual declaration of operations with third parties, the total number of transactions carried out with you in the previous year, according to Our notes, amounts to the amount reflected in the attached document.


In case there is any difference with your accounts, please be advised to communicate it as soon as possible, otherwise, we will give the quantity indicated accordingly.


We take this opportunity to greet you.
